titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a postage stamp should be issued in commemoration of Diwali, a festival celebrated by people of Indian origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/26/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a postage stamp should be issued in commemoration of Diwali, a festival celebrated by people of Indian origin.
